bibl.title: The 2011 Field Season at Deir Abu Metta, Dakhleh Oasis.
bibl.note: The church (Trench 15). - The structures to the north of the church (Trench 14). - The West Buildings (Trenches 12, 16 and 17). - Ostraka [18 texts in standard Sahidic Coptic, from the latter 4th through the 5th centuries]. - Summary and discussion. - The date of occupation of the site [3rd-7th centuries].

bibl.title: Bulletin of the Australian Centre for Egyptology

bibl.seg: Gillian Bowen, The 2011 Field Season at Deir Abu Metta, Dakhleh Oasis.

The church (Trench 15). - The structures to the north of the church (Trench 14). - The West Buildings (Trenches 12, 16 and 17). - Ostraka [18 texts in standard Sahidic Coptic, from the latter 4th through the 5th centuries]. - Summary and discussion. - The date of occupation of the site [3rd-7th centuries].
